SELECT ec.id, ec.`title`, ec.`price`, ec.cover, ec.`lesson_num`as lessonNum, ecd.`description`, et.`name` AS teacherName, es1.`title` AS twoSubject, es2.`title` AS oneSubject FROM edu_course ec LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id = ecd.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.`teacher_id` = et.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.`subject_id` = es1.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.`subject_parent_id` = es2.`id`
and ec.`id` = #{courseId}

SELECT ec.id, ec.`title`, ec.`price`, ec.cover, ec.`lesson_num`as lessonNum, ec.`buy_count` as buyCount, ec.`view_count`as viewCount, ecd.`description`, et.`name` AS teacherName, et.`id`as teacherId, et.intro, et.avatar, es1.`title` AS subjectLevelTwoId, es1.`id` as subjectLevelOneId, es2.`title` AS subjectLevelOne, es2.`id`as subjectLevelTwo FROM edu_course ec LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id = ecd.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.`teacher_id` = et.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.`subject_id` = es1.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.`subject_parent_id` = es2.`id`
and ec.`id` = #{courseId}
